value.title: Explore fundamentals of data visualization
value.excerpt: Learn the fundamental principles of analytical data modeling and data visualization, using Microsoft Power BI as a platform to explore these principles in action.

value.title: DAX Fridays #209: Open orders in DAX | Events in progress & Time intelligence
value.excerpt: In today's video, we are going to go through how to think about Time Intelligence calculations with a specific case: Calculating the number of open orders using DAX.  I read a million years ago a blog post from Gerhard where he explained how to do it and even though we are not going to use the same DAX

value.title: Show numbers in Thousands or Millions in same column with the new Dynamic formatting in Power BI
value.excerpt: If you want to be able to conditional format a number in Power BI as k for thousands and M for millions in the same column, the new Dynamic Formatting can do that for you.  Check this video to learn how. Download the sample file at the download center , number 079.  Join this channel membership to get

value.title: Link Power BI to an Excel file in SharePoint Online

value.title: Deployment Pipelines give you more CONTROL (Power BI Premium)
value.excerpt: With Deployment Pipelines, you can control your application life cycle stages. Keep content in sync at the different stages of your development. Power BI Premium is required. value.title: Get started with Power BI Paginated Reports
value.excerpt: Patrick walks you through how to create your first Paginated Report for Power BI, Power BI Report Server or SQL Server Reporting Services.

topItems.title: Getting started with Power BI Paginated Reports (2021)
topItems.excerpt: Not sure what Power BI Paginated Reports are or how to use them? Patrick walks you through and points you to some great resources to get up and running quickly.  Power BI Paginated Reports require either Power BI Premium Per User or Power BI Premium capacity.  Paginated Report In a Day: https://docs.microsoft.com/power-bi/learning-catalog/paginated-reports-online-course

topItems.title: Power BI Paginated Reports: Data source, Dataset and parameters
topItems.excerpt: Paginated reports in Power BI are now available. Patrick walks you through how to get started with a paginated report using Report Builder. In this video, he starts off with how to create an embedded data source, a dataset, and parameters.  To download Report Builder, check out this link: https://guyinacu.be/reportbuilder

topItems.excerpt: Paginated reports in Power BI are now available. Now that you have data, Patrick walks you through how to build a matrix visual within the report. value.title: Work with Power BI visuals
value.excerpt: Learn how to choose from the exceptional visuals that Power BI makes available to you. Formatting visuals will direct the user‚Äôs attention to exactly where you want it, while helping to make the visual easier to read and interpret. You will also learn about how to use key performance indicators (KPIs).
